backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining video metadata, chunk storage, user data, interactions, and comments with functions for computing interaction summaries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test mappings for two Tailwind-related UI fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting up PWA metadata, icons, theme color, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, colors, display mode, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, navigation fallback, and cache cleanup for PWA support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root component configuring TanStack Router, React Query, theming, service worker registration, and route definitions.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileM: Renders a user profile dropdown with avatar, navigation links, theme toggle, upload options, and sign‑in/out handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/account/ThemeTog: Provides dropdown items to switch between light, dark, or system theme using next‑themes.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar component rendering route links with icons, active highlighting, and Tailwind-based styling.
frontend/src/components/ChannelHeader.ts: Displays a channel header with avatar, stats, and follow button, with a skeleton state during loading.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Renders comments for a video and provides an authenticated form to post new comments, with loading and fallback states.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: A button that toggles follow status with simulated async behavior and optional callback.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, search, notifications, and profile menu, including mobile-specific search UI.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper containing header, sidebar, bottom navigation, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Displays a notifications dropdown with unread counts, icons, timestamps, and actions to mark items as read.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: A dialog form for editing and saving user profile details including bio, social links, and images.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Handles PWA installation prompts for web and iOS, showing a dismissible install card when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/settings/MoodAIS: Shows and updates Mood AI preferences, including enabling the feature and selecting a mood, with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Desktop sidebar navigation listing main app routes with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Displays a video thumbnail, metadata, and channel info with links to watch or visit the channel.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Streams video chunks via actor-based loader, showing progress, errors, offline fallback, or a placeholder when metadata is missing.
frontend/src/components/watch/useWatchSh: Custom hook to share a video via Web Share API or clipboard fallback with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/watch/WatchActio: Renders action buttons for like/dislike, comments, sharing, saving, and downloading on a video watch page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Provides a hook for chunked video uploads with progress, cancellation, retry, and metadata handling via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook that manages identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodSignals.ts: Tracks local engagement signals and infers a mood based on watch patterns, likes, and activity, persisting data to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Manages user notifications with localStorage persistence, seeding demo data and providing read/unread helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend data such as videos, metadata, and interaction states, with placeholder and real actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useShortUpload.ts: Handles short video uploads using ExternalBlob with progress tracking and returns a direct URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables, scrollbar hiding, and mobile safe-area support.
frontend/src/lib/followCopy.ts: Contains copy text and formatting helpers for follow-related UI labels.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/videoFileMetadata.ts: Provides an interface and async helper to extract video duration, resolution, and MIME type using HTML5 metadata loading with timeout fallback.
frontend/src/lib/videoStreamSource.ts: Implements a chunk-based video streaming source that fetches validated ranges from the backend and can assemble them into a Blob URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelPage.tsx: Displays a user channel with profile data, mock videos, social links, and profile editing when viewing own channel.
frontend/src/pages/FollowingPage.tsx: Shows videos from followed channels with sign-in gating and mock video data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a simple grid of mock video cards.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Displays uploaded, liked, and saved videos using tabs, fetching metadata and gating access by sign‑in.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides a multi-section settings UI for general, playback, privacy, and notifications with local state controls.
frontend/src/pages/ShortsPage.tsx: Displays a scrollable feed of shorts with mood-based recommendations, watch tracking, and video playback controls.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Provides a form to upload full-length videos with metadata extraction and chunked upload handling.
frontend/src/pages/UploadShortPage.tsx: Allows users to upload short videos under 60 seconds, validating duration and registering the short in the backend.
frontend/src/pages/WatchPage.tsx: Renders a video watch page with metadata, interactions, comments, sharing, and mood signal tracking.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Handles service worker registration, update detection, unregistration, and PWA environment checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, border radii, and an HSL-based color system including a bottom nav bar color (#1a1a1a).
project_state.json: Project state describing a fix request to ensure the bottom tab bar background reliably uses the darker #1a1a1a color.
